title: The Diamond Quest2.0.3.apk
description:
Description
Diamond Quest.
Millions of years ago dragons used to rule this world. Shendron the most powerful of them,also known as King of all dragons ruled the city of Dragorion. Shendron was kind and wise but power and wealth dragged him to darkness. Whole world was Disturbed by Shendron. The World needs a hero,someone who can defeat Shendron in his own game.Can you be the one ?
You will have many Magicians to help you in your noble deed.But this is not easy. Do you have what it takes to face Shendron ? Play Diamond Quest and prove yourself.
Basic Rule:-
Collect Diamonds from Creature in one level to unlock other levels and meet the Dreadful Shendron in the end in his Dragorion.
Hit creatures and take the gold coins. Buy hammers with the gold coins. Hitting with hammers produces multiple coins.
As soon as you defeat Shendron, GMC(Game Master Controller) unlocks. With GMC you can change any aspect of game and customise it the way you want to play it.
Read Tutorial for other details.
Thank you
HAPPY PLAYING!!

get it on google play store:-

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.jazz.DiamondQuest3D&hl=en" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
